sourcesContent:
export const Content = [
  {
    category: "about",
    link: `${window.location.origin}/about#me`,
    name: "Me, Myself and I",
    excerpt: `I’m a developer from India who loves building responsive web applications. I’m passionate about solving problems and delivering user-friendly designs that stand out. I’m always eager to learn new technologies and stay updated on industry trends.`
  },
  {
    category: "about",
    link: `${window.location.origin}/about#skills`,
    name: "An overview of my technical skills and interests",
    excerpt: `HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Python, C, Java, Basics of Networking, SQL, MongoDB.`
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/YSShalini/job_suggestion",
    name: "Job Quest - Job Recommendation Portal",
    excerpt: `A platform that connects users with job opportunities by matching their skills with relevant job postings. Users can search for jobs, save listings, and apply directly, making the job search process more efficient and user-friendly.`
    
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/YSShalini/Google-Search-Results-Portfolio",
    name: "Personal Portfolio",
    excerpt: `A personal website simulating the Google Search platform. Developed with React
    HTML and CSS`
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://enjeck.com/",
    name: "Personal Website",
    excerpt: `My personal website, designed and developed from scratch. It
    features a lot of hover effects, custom styling and a blog.`
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/enjeck/libre-logos",
    name: "Libre Logos",
    excerpt: `A project to provide free logos to open source projects.
    Website and logos designed and built by yours truly. 
    The website is responsive and the individual logo pages are 
    programmatically-generated.`
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/enjeck/jpg2svg",
    name: "jpg2svg",
    excerpt: `An program to convert JPG/JPEG images into SVG. It comes with a web interface where 
    you can upload an image, have it converted to SVG in the server, and you can 
    download the converted SVG file if you want.`
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/enjeck/CrazyPassword",
    name: "Crazy Password",
    excerpt: `A password validation game with ridiculous requirements. 
    Using Django for this project was overkill, but I really wanted to 
     play around with regular expressions in Python, and Django already had
     a password validation engine I could add unto.`
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/enjeck/Geo-Guess",
    name: "Geo Guess",
    excerpt: `A distance guessing game. You are shown random cities around the world,
    and you have to guess how far you are from the random city. The better your
    guesss, the higher your score.`
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/enjeck/btns",
    name: "btns",
    excerpt: `A collection of buttons with cool hover effects.`,
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/YSShalini/machine-type-app",
    name: "Blobby",
    excerpt: `
    Generative blob SVG characters using Python. No characters are the same! 
    Each Blobby character has a different body shape. The shape is always unique, 
    and the colors and eyes are randomly applied to each shape.  `
  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/YSShalini/Fitness_Goals_Tracker",
    name: "Fitness Goals Tracker - Personal Health Management",
excerpt: `A user-friendly website designed to help individuals set, track, and achieve their fitness goals. Users can log workouts, monitor progress, and receive personalized recommendations, all in one convenient platform that promotes healthy living and accountability.`

  },
  {
    category: "works",
    link: "https://github.com/YSShalini/Library-_Management_system",
    name: "Library Management System - Efficient Book Tracking",
excerpt: `A comprehensive system for managing library resources, including tracking book loans, returns, and user registrations. Built using Python and MySQL, this project streamlines library operations, making it easier for librarians and users to access and manage books effectively.`

  },

  
  

  {
    category: "social",
    link: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/shalini-y-s-bb269b23b/",
    name: "LinkedIn",
    excerpt: `Connect with me`
  },
  {
    category: "social",
    link: "https://github.com/YSShalini",
    name: "GitHub",
    excerpt: `View my projects and code.`
  }
];
